root.name: X-Men: Mutant Academy 2
root.description: Overview X-Men: Mutant Academy 2 is a 3D fighting game based on the X-Men franchise. This is the last game of four to use the game engine originally built for Thrill Kill. The game was released on September 17, 2001.Playable Characters Cyclops Wolverine Gambit Storm Jean Grey Beast Rogue Nightcrawler Psylocke Havok Forge Toad Magneto Sabretooth Mystique Juggernaut Spider-Man Professor X

similar_games.game: Marvel vs. Capcom 2: New Age of Heroes
